text: Caribbean mocktail #1 Pour 3oz grapefruit juice and 3oz cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour the shaken mixture into an interesting glass. A cocktail glass would be fine. Add crushed ice and decorations. For example, a mini umbrella, sliced lemon, or  sliced lime, etc. Serve immediately.  Caribbean mocktail #2 Cut the pineapple into cubes or chunks. Add to the cocktail shaker and muddle (squash to release the juices). Pour the green tea and lemon juice into the shaker. Use a teaspoon to transfer the jam. Add crushed ice. Shake well. Strain into serving glasses. Add more ice to the glasses if you want a really chilled mocktail. Serve immediately. Add a garnish and a straw. Caribbean mocktail #3 Add a 1/2 cup of crushed ice to the glass.  Fill the mason jar halfway with fizzy lemonade.  Add 1 part non-fizzy lemonade with one part orange juice to fill the remainder space.  Add the cherry for decoration.  Serve. Pop in a straw and enjoy.
